name: MY DAUGHTER IS A CULTIST! SE
name_original: MY DAUGHTER IS A CULTIST! SE
description:
A Short horror experience.

YOU'RE JUST A NORMAL GUY TRYING TO GET SOME SLEEP. YOU HEAR A BUMP IN THE NIGHT.
WHAT WAS THAT? WHY IS YOUR DAUGHTER ACTING SO WEIRD? IS IT PARENTHOOD OR A HORRIBLE CURIOSITY THAT COMPELS YOU TO FIND OUT?

OBJECTIVE:

FIND OUT WHY YOUR DAUGHTER IS ACTING SO WEIRD AND WHAT'S MAKING ALL THIS NOISE.

FEATURES:

• JAPANESE HORROR MEETS LOVECRAFT

• MULTIPLE ENDINGS (4)

• MANGA STYLE VISUALS

• CONTROLLER SUPPORT

• KEYBOARD AND MOUSE SUPPORT

• PHOTOMODE WITH STICKERS AND ALTERNATE OUTFITS

• ENDING GALLERY
